Disease.content:

Paragraph: A rat model of IUGR was established by PCE , male fetuses and adult offspring at the age of postnatal week 24 were euthanized .

| --- |

Explanation:

* IUGR (Intrauterine growth restriction) is the only disease entity mentioned in the paragraph. It is a condition that occurs when a fetus doesn't grow at a normal rate inside the womb.
